info.name: Dark Teambuilder Pokemon Showdown Theme
info.description: This is the teambuilder I use to build teams, I like it a lot and find it very eye-soothing so I wanted to share it with other users. As the name indicates it's a dark theme which affects only the teambuilder related parts of Pokemon Showdown, this theme affects Smogon University(main) and all "psim.us" servers. If you like this style, don't hesitate to drop a like and positive comment, and if you have any issues with this theme or any bugs, you can find me at a server such as Wisp under the name @Master Float.
info.additionalInfo:
Made .teamlist team's buttons dark.
Made .statform p.suggested a's color to #0094FF.

Update: folderpane, buttons, select in teambuilder...
Update: setchart, sortrow in teambuilder...
